Reviews.Title: Not worth it.
Reviews.Author: Bill D.
Reviews.Content: The unit produced an acceptable, not great, picture. The picture could not be viewed from any more than a slight angle. The worst feature was the sound. It was hard to hear and tinny. I was very unhappy with it so I returned it to Amazon for a refund. As always their return policy was great. I would not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Different purpose use - security monitor
Reviews.Author: Vance
Reviews.Content: Ok,so I was installing a 4 channel wired surveillance system w/ dvr and needed a screen to view it with. I had no extra computer monitor but didn't want a hulking CRT either...hence the flat screen. I did not think even generic computer monotors cost double what I paid for this..even clearance staples monitors were 50 bucks more...fine if I planned to have other purposes or possibilities for it but since I mainly wanted something for pure security monitoring...cheaper route is fine. Enter the Proscan. Since my security DVR had both HDMI and monitor ports...I found this for 88 bucks! Why not? Hooked it up and it worked fine!Cons:- Speakers are not great but since I'm only listening to security audio...no dolby surround needed- Light as all hell..plasticy - I thought I got an empty box but it was in there- Remote is cheapy but it works and serves the purpose, I'll let you know if/when I drop it accidentally  HAHA- TV menus are basic enough - spartan if that- back connections, who the #$%! decided it was a good idea to recess the row of connection points?! If you have a stiff cable (like the HDMI or the typical boxy VGA) prepare for some wire acrobatics...otherwise, 45 or 90 connection is friendlier. I think this is the peeve that really confuses me design-wise...still scratching my head on this one!I put fair stars - to be completely objective, it serves MY purposes well. Would I buy this for a everyday entertainment piece? No....not that it doesn't function..but I would certainly chip in some extra bucks for a more user friendly, higher performance TV. Otherwise, it is cheaper than a monitor and much cheaper than "security" flatscreens which is essentially the same darn thing. For what it's worth....

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: allen ma
Reviews.Content: a very good product, with a cheap price. i Use it as a monitor, and it works wonderful, and the spund it not bad.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: James N. Nichols "DR JIM"
Reviews.Content: Strongly suggest anyone looking for a small bedroom or kitchen TV avoid Proscan and spend a few bucks more. The picture is much worse than my non-HDTV and the sound is so poor, it is hard to understand. It is also impossible to get enough volume to hear while one is in bed. Junk!

Reviews.Title: Product was liked but the shipper messed up
Reviews.Author: alannah Augustine lebow
Reviews.Content: Love this TV the only problems is the top part seems to have a color problem but that might be from kids messing with the color or it being slanted. The first time I received it the piece that connects the base to the TV was missing so I had to return my so birthday gift and wait. Also the package was already opened before and had been taped shut. It was supposed to be new but it wasn't.

Reviews.Title: PROSCAN 19-inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Andy Reynolds
Reviews.Content: The performance of the Proscan LED HDTV is better than expected. I am particularly impressed with the picture and the performance of the remote control. It is responsive from just about any location in my office. That wasn't the case with the tv it is replacing.

Reviews.Title: Cheap product...CHEAP customer service
Reviews.Author: D. MATHIAS "Living in the REAL world..."
Reviews.Content: Had my PROSCAN only 4 months ... Remote didn't work from day #1, called company, they sent a new remote in 12 WEEKS ... It didn't fix the problem ... For example, when you press #8, it should jump to channel 8 ... Nope, never worked on ANY numbers, which was why I asked for new remote ... That said & completed, I now have lines going thru the picture ... After placing a different tv on that jack, to be certain it was  the PROSCAN and not my wall jack, I called customer service .... I was informed that "I" must pay to ship the TV back to them, and they decide if I get a repair or replacement ... Not fair, still under warranty! ... Rep said it was a problem the company is aware of on this model ... Well geez, then YOU should pay to fix it ... I paid the purchase price already!It will cost about $25 to ship base rate, plus will take 6-8 weeks to get back the repaired tv ... Is this fair? .... NO ... I later found out thru feedback on several other websites that sell PROSCAN, that their entire tv line is having issues with defective hardware, LED backlighting, and more .... and it's a branch off RCA (well RCA used to be good) .... Never buying another PROSCAN nor RCA.... Not the same good quality of years past ... I have a SAMSUNG 19 inch that's held up 4 years, I plan to get another of those and garbage this PROSCAN in the dumpster on trash day next week.

Reviews.Title: Proscan -inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: DANIEL R. CRAZE
Reviews.Content: I really like the clear crisp picture.It is great.But the sound is not to good.Maybe if I could plug up some better speakers.That's the reason I gave it a 4 star.

Reviews.Title: Proscan TV
Reviews.Author: T J
Reviews.Content: This item was returned because I clicked onto the wrong item.  I did however get the 19 inch with dvd player and love it.

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Cathy Paiz
Reviews.Content: Prompt service  great price  awesome deal nice christmas present for family  very excited to set it up and plug it in

Reviews.Title: just fine
Reviews.Author: zerof150
Reviews.Content: i being in the home theater business ts not very good nice picture and all but like everybody else said on the reviews the sound stinks well let me tell you this no flat panel tv has good sound that why you use audio out to a system like i did and also it hangs under my kitchen cabinets over my sink so i can watch news wile i do dishes so for that it is perfect

Reviews.Title: I purchased new Proscan and recieved questionable product
Reviews.Author: Robert Vaughn
Reviews.Content: I recieved item on schedule but the packaging was qauestionable. There was no seal so it was easily opened and I find the stand is missing. There is a base that does not relate to this product so someone screwed up. This must have been restocked before. I wonder if this return procedure really works? The inconvenience is slightly annoying but I will attempt to return it. I have not plugged it in and don't know if it even works. I ordered a new one. I could make a stand out of wood I suppose. inconvenience is life experience for most of us, at least I'm still breathing so what do I have to complain about?
